this patch will help match our current practice

~~~
diff -r a41789cd6b9d cmake/IgnUtils.cmake
--- a/cmake/IgnUtils.cmake	Mon Oct 02 17:44:16 2017 -0700
+++ b/cmake/IgnUtils.cmake	Tue Oct 03 11:07:52 2017 -0700
@@ -448,7 +448,8 @@
   endforeach()
 
   # Define the install directory for the meta headers
-  set(meta_header_install_dir ${IGN_INCLUDE_INSTALL_DIR_FULL}/ignition/${IGN_DESIGNATION})
+  set(master_header_install_dir ${IGN_INCLUDE_INSTALL_DIR_FULL}/ignition)
+  set(config_header_install_dir ${IGN_INCLUDE_INSTALL_DIR_FULL}/ignition/${IGN_DESIGNATION})
 
   # Define the input/output of the configuration for the "master" header
   set(master_header_in ${IGNITION_CMAKE_DIR}/ign_auto_headers.hh.in)
@@ -460,7 +461,7 @@
   # Install the "master" header
   install(
     FILES ${master_header_out}
-    DESTINATION ${meta_header_install_dir}
+    DESTINATION ${master_header_install_dir}
     COMPONENT headers)
 
   # Define the input/output of the configuration for the "config" header
@@ -480,7 +481,7 @@
   # Install the "config" header
   install(
     FILES ${config_header_out}
-    DESTINATION ${meta_header_install_dir}
+    DESTINATION ${config_header_install_dir}
     COMPONENT headers)
 
 endfunction()
